project.description: Download the current psama.env file that has been configured and will be used to configure the pic-sure-auth-micro-app.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
set -e # Source folder containing the scripts source_scripts_folder="${JENKINS_HOME}/workspace/Bash_Functions/" ls -la "$source_scripts_folder"
# Iterate through the files in the folder and source them for script_file in "$source_scripts_folder"*.sh; do chmod +x "$script_file" if [ -f "$script_file" ] && [ -x "$script_file" ]; then echo "sourcing $script_file" source "$script_file" fi done
# Upload the psama.env file to S3 aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp s3://$stack_s3_bucket/configs/psama/psama.env psama.env
